--- title: Oscillator keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This defines the Oscillator module which is used to generate waveforms" description: "This defines the Oscillator module which is used to generate waveforms" nb_path: "00_oscillator.ipynb" ---

{% endraw %}

Generating Waveforms

First, let's define the different waveforms that the oscillator can generate

{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Each waveform is digitised using integer bit vectors. These must be defined from the following

{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Sine Wave

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
def plot_waveform(x):
    plt.plot([i._val for i in x])

plot_waveform(sine)
{% endraw %}

Square Wave

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
plot_waveform(square)
{% endraw %}

Triangle Wave

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
plot_waveform(triangle)
{% endraw %}

Sawtooth Wave

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
plot_waveform(sawtooth)
{% endraw %}

Definein the Oscillator Module

{% raw %}

Oscillator[source]

Oscillator(z, state, clock:Signal, output_freq:int, reset, sampling_freq:int)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
